display_long_description:
In this demo you are going to experience few areas of the main game to give you the overall look and feel of the game. (Not suitable for children under 13 years old! Turn back if you are afraid of DARKNESS and HORROR)

Shadows of truth is a detective horror game where in each episode you are collecting clues, solving the relation of the clues and getting closer to the truth. Embark on a chilling journey into the depths of mystery and intrigue.

[media]

**Season 1**

Begins with a detective's trusted friend, a brilliant scientist, vanishing amidst the chaos of his groundbreaking invention.". Amidst swirling rumors, a secret society emerges, aiming to seize control of this revolutionary technology.

Navigate through a labyrinth of secrets and deception to uncover the truth.

Will you unravel the conspiracy and rescue your friend?
Or will you get caught to the lurk around every corner?

The choice is yours. Dive into the mystery today.

**Features:**
- Photorealistic graphics
- Immersive VR experience
- Solving clues on a mind board
- Hiding from enemies
- Horror and scary elements
- Not suitable for children under 10 years old


[media]
